title.rendered: Armed Forces Day + Homeschoolers! + Kids Corner

content.rendered:
Armed Forces Day

On Saturday, May 21, active and retired military will receive 20% off of used books. We are so thankful for the men and women who served our country.

Homeschool Section: Behind the Scenes

Calling all homeschoolers! We are creating a space just for you at our Byron location. All of our homeschool material will be located there. We will have special pricing for these items, and you’ll still receive your teacher discount on top of that! This will be a well-lighted, properly organized, and spacious place to discover homeschool resources for a great price.

Here’s a look at some of the renovations.

Kids Corner

June will kick off our Kids Corner summer reading events at Macon and Warner Robins! It is always a FREE event and we always have great readers, yummy snacks, and a ton of giveaways. Here’s a first look at the schedule:

Warner Robins (1806 Russell Pkwy) @ 10:30 A.M.
June 7, 14, 21, & 28
July 5, 12, & 19

Macon (2834 Riverside Dr.) @ 10:30 A.M.
June 9, 16, 23, & 30
July 7, 14, & 21

More information coming soon!
